```{r}
penguins <- read.csv("penguins.csv")
head(penguins)
```
```{r}
install.packages("ggplot2")
```


```{r}
library(ggplot2)
ggplot(penguins, aes(x=Sex)) + geom_bar()
```
```{r}
str(penguins)
```

```{r}
ggplot(penguins, aes(x=Culmen.Length..mm., fill=Species)) + geom_histogram(bins=25, position = "dodge")
```
